name: Forest of Strays
description:
A girl went deep into a misterious woodland in an attempt to find her missing cat, but now she's lost below the treetops... Even though she knows the forest holds many traps and creatures, she persists on her quest to bring her cat back home.


  • 16 levels;
  • 16 challenge level variants;
  • 2 bosses;
  • Many collectibles!


  • AD / Left and Right Arrow keys - Move
  • W / Up Arrow key / Space - Jump
  • Z / L - Attack

Controller:

  • Left Stick / Direction Pad - Move
  • A / B - Jump
  • X / Y / Triggers - Attack
